clients.title: Expand Your Homepage with Practice Area Summaries
description: If you haven't already, we recommend expanding your Homepage content to include individual paragraphs within the narrative, where you briefly cover each of the main practice areas you are looking to target. Your potential clients will easily be able to see what your firm handles at a quick glance, and including these individual practice area paragraphs will help with your organic and local SEO as well.
